block.p: Alfama, 551 Hudson Street (Perry Street), will hold a tasting of wines and cheeses from Portugal on Saturday from 4 to 7 p.m. The fee is $45; (212) 645-2500.
A class in outdoor grilling will be given on June 17 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m., followed by lunch, at the Rye Town Hilton, 699 Westchester Avenue, Rye Brook, N.Y. The cost is $95; (914) 934-2555.

The season for fresh herring flown in from the Netherlands has started in earnest.

The lightly marinated fish is now being served at Grand Central Oyster Bar in Grand Central Terminal; Aquavit, 13 West 54th Street; Aquagrill, 210 Spring Street (Avenue of the Americas); and Ulrika's, 115 East 60th Street.
It is also sold retail at Russ & Daughters, 179 East Houston Street (Allen Street).
